sentences.en: Austria lies to the southeast of Germany.
Domestic chickens are descended from jungle fowl of Southeast Asia.
sentences.cn: 家鸡是由东南亚原鸡演变而来的。

sentences.en: From time to time there were sudden explosions of a southeast wind.
sentences.cn: 不时有阵阵猛烈的东南风突然刮来.

sentences.en: Heath was acute in his assessment of Southeast Asia and the Middle East.
sentences.cn: 希思深刻地分析了东南亚和中东局势.

sentences.en: I know we have to go southeast, more or less.
sentences.cn: 我知道我们大概得往东南方向走。

sentences.en: It shook buildings as far away as Galveston, 90 miles to the southeast.
sentences.cn: 它震动了东南方向90英里远的加尔维斯顿的建筑物。

sentences.en: Miles upon miles to the east and southeast the desert unrolled itself.
sentences.cn: 荒野绵延万里的向东面和东南面铺展开去.

sentences.en: Our factory exports to Southeast Asia.
sentences.cn: 我厂向东南亚出口产品.

sentences.en: Sudden rainstorms are frequent on the southeast coast.
sentences.cn: 在东南沿海地区,突如其来的暴风骤雨是常见的.

sentences.en: The curtain must now rise on a widely different scene in Southeast Asia before the readers.
sentences.cn: 现在必须在读者面前展开东南亚的一幅迥然不同的画面.

sentences.en: The problem is not restricted to the southeast.
sentences.cn: 这个问题并不只存在于东南部。

sentences.en: The Rodney, five hundred miles away to the southeast, was ordered to steer a closing course.
sentences.cn: 远在东南方五百里的“罗德尼”号奉命抄近行驶.

sentences.en: The security of all of southeast Asia will be endangered if Laos loses its neutral independence.
sentences.cn: 如果老挝失去了它中立立场的独立,整个东南亚的安全将受到威胁.

sentences.en: The southeast is the most densely populated area.
sentences.cn: 东南部是人口最稠密的地区。

sentences.en: the southeast quarter of the city
The two hotel-restaurants are attractive bases from which to explore southeast Tuscany.
sentences.cn: 对于去托斯卡纳东南部探险的人们来说，这两家酒店是很有吸引力的驻扎地。

sentences.en: This train would stop twice more in the suburbs before rolling southeast toward Munich.
sentences.cn: 火车向东南驶往慕尼黑前，会在郊区再停两站。

trans.tran_cn: 东南的，向东南的，位于东南的，东南部的
trans.tran_en: a southeast wind comes from the southeast

trans.tran_cn: 在东南，从东南，向东南，来自东南
trans.tran_en: If you go southeast, you travel toward the southeast

trans.tran_cn: 东南，东南方，（美国）东南部，东南地区
trans.tran_en: the direction that is exactly between south and east
the direction that is exactly between south and east
